lead_paragraph: Rusty, rested or reeling, LeBron James and the Cavaliers find a way to beat the Hawks in the playoffs every time.

headline.print_headline: LeBron, Cavs Hold Off Hawks 104-93 in Game 1
headline.main: LeBron, Cavs Hold Off Hawks 104-93 in Game 1
